neuronalAnatomy.description: Number of input morphological reconstructions used

neuronalAnatomy.description: Number of excitatory or inhibitory mtypes

neuronalPhysiology.description: Number of electrical types used in the model

neuronalPhysiology.description: Name of unique e-types present in the region

neuronalPhysiology.name: Count of morpho-electrical (me) types
neuronalPhysiology.description: Number of me types present in the region

neuronalPhysiology.name: Single cell models used in the region
neuronalPhysiology.description: Count of single cell models used in the region

neuronalPhysiology.name: Electrophysiological traces
neuronalPhysiology.description: Count of electrophysiological traces used in the model

neuronalPhysiology.name: Ion Channel Model
neuronalPhysiology.description: Count of ion channel models used

neuronalPhysiology.name: Initial Electrical Models
neuronalPhysiology.description: Count of single cell models used in the region

synapticAnatomy.name: Intrinsic Connections
synapticAnatomy.description: Number of connections formed within the region by intrinsic cells

synapticAnatomy.name: Intrinsic Synapses
synapticAnatomy.description: Number of synapses formed within the region by intrinsic cells

synapticAnatomy.name: Synapse per connection
synapticAnatomy.description: Average number of intrinsic synapses formed by intrinsic connections

synapticAnatomy.name: Synapse density
synapticAnatomy.description: Density of the synapse in the region

synapticPhysiology.name: Synaptic types
synapticPhysiology.description: Number of synaptic types present in the region

synapticPhysiology.name: Synaptic classes
synapticPhysiology.description: Number of synaptic classes present in the region

synapticPhysiology.name: Receptor type
synapticPhysiology.description: List of receptor types present in the region

networkAnatomy.name: Layers
networkAnatomy.description: Number of layers in the region

networkAnatomy.name: Neurons
networkAnatomy.description: Number of neurons in the region

networkAnatomy.name: Cell density
networkAnatomy.description: Density of cells in the region

networkAnatomy.name: Layer Volumes
networkAnatomy.description: Volume of different layers of the region

networkAnatomy.name: Excitatory-Inhibitory Ratio
networkAnatomy.description: Ratio of excitatory to inhibitory cells

schafferCollaterals.name: Extrinsic Synapses
schafferCollaterals.description: Number of synapses formed by intrinsic cells with Schaffer Collateral

schafferCollaterals.name: Extrinsic to Intrinsic Synapse Ratio
schafferCollaterals.description: Percentage of extrinsic to intrinsic synapses

schafferCollaterals.name: Mean Synapse on PC
schafferCollaterals.description: Mean number of extrinsic synapses formed on pyramidal cells

schafferCollaterals.name: Mean Synapse on INT
schafferCollaterals.description: Mean number of extrinsic synapses formed on interneurons

schafferCollaterals.name: Viable Pathways
schafferCollaterals.description: Number of viable pathways in terms of mtype pairs between Schaffer Collateral and CA1

schafferCollaterals.name: External Synapse Classes
schafferCollaterals.description: Number of synapse classes for connections between Schaffer Collateral and CA1

schafferCollaterals.name: External Synapse Groups
schafferCollaterals.description: Number of synapse groups for connections between Schaffer Collateral and CA1

schafferCollaterals.name: Receptor Types
schafferCollaterals.description: Number of receptor types for connections between Schaffer Collateral and CA1
